title: Three Murders in Hull:  Episode 220
description:
When three sex workers were killed in Hull in the late 1990's, it was feared that a serial killer was operating in the area.Â  In this episode of the UK True Crime podcast, I examine just what happened to 25 year old Natalie Clubb, 20 year old Hayley Morgan and 29 year old Samantha Class.
